personal.bio: I'm a highly motivated Computer Science undergraduate specializing in Java backend development. My passion lies in designing, developing, and deploying robust web applications using modern technologies like Spring Boot, React, and various databases.
personal.aboutText: With demonstrated expertise in building scalable backend systems, optimizing database performance, and integrating secure services, I bring strong problem-solving skills and a collaborative mindset to every project. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and tackle challenging development environments.
